content: Unleash your smartphone’s true potential using the virtual reality cardboard kit. This do-it-yourself kit allows you to quickly build your own headset so you can experience your favorite movies in a fun and immersive and cost effective way.

Get a first hand glimpse at one of the most beautiful mineral specimens that planet Earth has to offer when you purchase some titanium quartz. It comes infused with rare minerals and treats your eyes to a captivating combination of violet, green, blue, yellow, and pink.

Develop the bone crushing handshake you’ve always dreamed of by working out vigorously with this hand exerciser. The device straps on comfortably and allows you to adjust the tension so you can build up your strength.

Put an extra kick in your step by starting off your day with a double shot of the good stuff served out of this unique coffee mug. The mug’s clever design lets you enjoy both a high octane shot of espresso and a cup of Joe without having to dirty an additional mug.

Get your adrenaline pumping after stopping a rampaging Indominus Rex from tearing the Jurassic World LEGO set to shreds. Using a state of the art chopper and your moxie, you’ll track, capture, and put this fearsome predator back in his cage.

Sync and charge virtually any portable device at a moment’s notice with help from the geeky Swiss army knife. This twenty-first century tool comes packed with a range of different connectors so you achieve compatibility with any device you may have.

Take your photography to new depths by performing underwater shoots with the waterproof camera case. This unique cases envelops your entire camera and features UV coating polycarbonate on the lens so you can take clear pictures.

Keep the kids from driving you crazy during your next outing by entertaining them using the drive thru placemat with crayons. Using car shaped crayons, they’ll be able to color for hours on end – making it ideal for restaurants and long road trips.

Be ready to knock one back at a moment’s notice like a true alcoholic by carrying along this collapsible beer glass. Whenever the opportunity to enjoy a nice frosty one comes up, you only need to flick your wrist and your trusty glass magically extends before your eyes.

Give your zen garden a stylish touch by growing your own black pine bonsai tree. Ideal for those who love to get their hands dirty, the kit comes with everything you’ll need to successfully grow a beautiful miniature Black Pine tree.

Carry a whole toolbox comfortably in your pocket by toting around this needlenose pliers multi-tool. It features a lightweight and ergonomic design to reduce slippage and comes jam packed with twelve water resistant tools to help you get the job done.

Get on the fast track to a healthy diet by preparing your meals on the smokeless indoor BBQ grill. The bold and functional design makes it remarkably simple to grill meats and veggies, and features a stainless steel drip pan to help reduce fat and cholesterol.

Keep your LEGO Springfielders satisfied by fulfilling all their shopping needs with The Simpsons LEGO Kwik-E-Mart. Springfield’s beloved convenience store features a removable roof and comes with Chief Wiggum and his cruiser in tow to keep Snake in line.

Go camping without ever losing contact with civilization by keeping your phone charged using the portable solar panel. The fold up design takes up virtually no space and allows you to easily charge your electronic devices with natural sunlight while you’re on the go.

Protect your phone from accidental falls brought on by a night of hard drinking by guarding it with this vodka bottle iPhone case. It’s made from a transparent durable material that’s smooth to the touch and allows you full access to all your phone’s features.

Get more done on your smartphone or tablet with help from the foldable keyboard. This useful accessory can simultaneously pair with two devices and features an ultra slim foldable design that will fit virtually anywhere your smartphone or tablet can.

Ensure you have an exit strategy in the event of an automobile accident by keeping the tactical automobile rescue tool handy. Apart from containing a razor sharp blade, this compact tool also features a seatbelt cutter, a flashlight, and window puncher.

Avoid getting stranded in the middle of nowhere by making sure you’ve got the mini car jumpstarter with you. Small enough to fit in your glove compartment, this mighty little device is capable of powering up anything from an iPhone to an 8 cylinder engine.

Draw the person you thought you’d grow up to be before you abandoned all your hopes and dreams when you begin doodling in the “Coloring Book For Grown-Ups”. It comes jam packed with coloring activities for all of adult life’s disappointing realities.

Prepare delicious cocktails without having to ever get out of the cool water when you have the floating drink bar in your pool. Designed to hold eight cups and one pitcher, it features a buoyant design that won’t tip over as you handle your drink.

Avoid looking like a bum during your next work trip by packing the mini travel iron along for the ride. Its compact size allows it to comfortably fit in your suitcase and is capable of reaching temperatures up to 300 degrees Fahrenheit to iron out those pesky wrinkles.

Liven up your drab T.P.S. reports by swapping out your standard tape for this rainbow tape dispenser. This custom tape comes printed with a multicolored rainbow design that’ll brighten up any document stuck together to make it look a little more magical!

Enjoy unrestricted movement as you hike through your favorite trails by carrying your gear in the anti-gravity suspension backpack. The innovative 3D suspension system provides unmatched comfort by contouring to your body and providing superb weight distribution.

Easily drain your steamed veggies and pasta without making a mes by cooking them in this stainless steel straining stockpot. It features thick rolled rims for added durability and comes with a specialized lid that makes it a breeze to drain the pot without spilling.

Enjoy the addictive flavor of Albuquerque’s signature fast food chicken from the comfort of home, bitch! It’s made with 14 not-so-secret ingredients to create a chemically pure and stable product. No adulterants. No baby formula. No chili powder.

Accompany your favorite tunes with cool visual effects by listening to them using these light up headphones. Apart from delivering high quality sound, they come with integrated fiber optic technology that makes them pulse to the beat of the music.

Get a machine quality wash while living off the grid with the portable washing machine. At only 5 ounces, this revolutionary washer is remarkably easy to use and efficiently cleans clothes in minutes without the use of electricity – making it ideal for camping trips.

Keep your little pet bird entertained for hours by installing this interactive bird toy in their cage. Apart from a compact mirror, it also features four easy to press buttons that articulate different phrases in order to encourage speech.

Perform daily maintenance on your mustache ride with help from this switchblade mustache comb. It’s small enough to fit comfortably in your pocket so you can keep your glorious lady pleasing whiskers looking distinguished at all times

Turn any beach, backyard, or park into the perfect barbecue site with this portable propane grill. This heavy duty steel grill will fit just about anywhere and comes with a grease tray and side tables in addition to a built-in igniter that lets you get right to cooking.

Place the finishing touches on your Japanese themed bathroom with these decorative sushi roll towels. Each of these 100% cotton towels come printed with a culinary design that makes them resemble long and fluffy sushi rolls when rolled up.

Keep your darkest secrets safe from prying eyes with this secret decoder cipher wheel. It’s crafted from a solid piece of wood and features twelve letter engraved disks that rotate clockwise and counterclockwise to help you conceal information.

Carry an exit strategy on you at all times by accenting your bespoke suit with the gentlemen’s wearable lockpicks. Made from stainless steel, it features a  discreet and ergonomic design you can pin on a variety of garments.

Stop accidentally tripping over your undone laces by replacing them with these elastic shoelaces. These one size fits all laces are durable, easy to install, and turn practically any sneaker you have into a slip on shoe – and come in a variety of colors.

Simply flawless is what you’ll say upon seeing Queen B at her finest moment on this Beyoncé mousepad. It is made using a special process to ensure the image captured during her Superbowl performance will never fade – despite her publicist’s best efforts.

Get the kids to place their dirty laundry in its rightful place by turning it into a game using this Game Boy laundry hamper. The hamper assembles in a snap and features a retro Game Boy design that any old school gamer will love.

Encourage the kids to play with their food by serving up their favorite drink or cereal in the basketball hoop mug. This ceramic mug features a built-in hoop ideal for dunking marshmallows into hot chocolate or toppings into delicious ice cream.

Elevate your photography game by capturing professional quality shots using the portable camera dolly system. The dolly is built to handle equipment weighing up to 20 pounds and is designed to be extremely flexible so you can get the perfect shot.

Remind everyone that you’re a force to be reckoned with come draft day by sporting this fantasy football championship ring. Made from high quality brass, it comes coated in 18K gold and features a rhinestone encrusted border.

Grab life by the horns and make the most out of your beach day by exploring the coastline on your inflatable windsurfer and sailboat. It’s compact enough to carry anywhere and gives you the option of using it as a sailboat or for wind surfing.

Ensure your meals are cooked to perfection by preparing your poultry with the Bluetooth kitchen thermometer. Instead of having to constantly check up on your bird, it lets you monitor everything from your phone so you know when it’s at just the right point.

Whip up cocktails like a seasoned pro by preparing them using your master mixologist tools. Ideal for any home bar, this high grade stainless steel set comes with various common bar tools like a jigger and four prong strainer.

Improve your chances of taking home a big catch by heading out with the smartphone connected fish finder. It connects to smartphones and tablets and utilizes Bluetooth technology to transfer sonar readings directly to your phone’s screen up to 150 feet.

Improve your custom built PC’s aesthetics by giving it a luminous glow using the remote control LED light strip. Once the lights have been positioned to your desired shape, a remote control lets you alter the color and pulse setting for some truly eye catching effects.

Keep the party going all day without having to get out of the water by serving up refreshments using the floating drink cooler. Aptly shaped like a little tug boat, this cooler comes with a forty can capacity and includes two cup holders for added convenience.

Enjoy the water all to yourself by scaring everyone away with the swimming shark fin. This fun beach toy features a realistic dorsal fin so you can convincingly pull off your prank while the ergonomic design allows you to swim freely about.

Turn your kitchen into the best pizza joint in town by making your own homemade pies using the pizza oven box. This unique oven comes specially designed to cook some of the most delicious pizzas you’ve ever tasted.

Skillfully fire deadly rocks at speeds up to 350 feet per second by shooting them out of this pocket slingshot! Featuring a compact design, this modern slingshot is capable of firing an assortment of different sized projectiles with lethal accuracy.

Keep your electronic devices fully charged while on the go using the solar panel charger backpack. The backpack sports a high efficiency solar panel powerful enough to charge everything from smartphones to laptops – making it ideal for outdoor excursions.

Avoid first degree burns in the kitchen by using the built-in oven gloves attached to this clever apron. Apart from protecting your clothes against stains, the apron comes with easily accessible gloves designed for handling all types of hot trays.

Explore the topography of the oceanic floors in great detail by decorating your home with these wood bathymetric charts. Each of these laser cut charts displays a three dimensional rendering of a select island and its nearby surroundings.

Forget about the oven and cook pizza anywhere there’s an open flame utilizing the flameproof pizza stone. This red stone measures sixteen inches across and can be used over any type of barbecue to create delicious home made pizzas.

Fix almost any problem that arises on your long trek by bringing along the bicycle multi-tool. With a compact design small enough to fit in a seat bag or hydration pack, this versatile tool weighs only 9.8 ounces and houses 12 different bike tools.

Keep an eye on the old ticker as you perform your daily physical activities by wearing the heart rate monitor wristband. It tracks your heart rate, workouts, and calories burned and displays them on a convenient OLED display.

Give your room or office some eye-catching nautical appeal by decorating it using the jellyfish aquarium. The aquarium’s unique design comes with a built in LED you can set to virtually any color in order to create mind boggling lighting effects as the jellyfish swim.

Always have the right tool for the job by carrying around the credit card sized multi-tool. The transparent case keeps all of the tools visible so you can find the right one with ease – and is slim enough to fit comfortably inside your pocket.

Send your taste buds on a wild journey by blasting them with a combination of sweet and sour from these rainbow candy bacon strips. Each multicolored strip is soft, chewy and comes bathed with enough sugar to simultaneously rot and satisfy your sweet tooth.

Class up the old console by giving it a sophisticated appearance with the wood Playstation 4 decal. If black and sleek isn’t for you, this decal has a simulated grain that resembles the real look and feel of actual wood making it an excellent alternative.

You call that a <del>knife</del> spatula? This is a <del>knife</del> spatula! Once you grill with the giant barbecue spatula there’s no going back to your less adequate tools. The enormous spatula surface is perfect for taking on the biggest grilling jobs with ease.

Take your breakfast game to a whole new level by serving up some restaurant styled flapjacks using the pancake batter dispenser. Made out of durable stainless steel, this device perfectly dispenses the batter without creating a mess in the kitchen.

Face the great outdoors with confidence by heading into the wild armed with the throwing knife multi-tool. This one of a kind knife is forged from a single piece of steel and includes over twenty useful tools built into the knife like a screwdriver and tobacco pipe.

Help keep your pigsty of a room a little more organized by placing some of your essential belongings in the bedside storage caddy. The functional design fits conveniently under the mattress and comes with a slew of pockets that are ideal for storage.

Prolong your miserable existence after the apocalypse hits by ensuring you’re equipped with The Walking Dead survival kit. This military green messenger back comes packed with all the essentials, like Mylar blankets, a compass, and glow sticks.

Give your furry friend a designated spot to relieve himself while you’re off at work with the real grass disposable dog potty. The long lasting hydroponically grown grass contains no dirt and boasts a complex root structure designed to absorb urine and odors.

Capture amazing footage of yourself charging down a monster wave by equipping your board with the GoPro surfboard mount. The mount is remarkably simple to install and is sturdy enough to handle choppy seas and gnarly wipeouts without ever becoming detached.

Enjoy Girl Scout cookies year round without the judgmental stares accompanied with your typical order of a dozen boxes of thin mints – because now you can bake them from the comfort of home using this officially licensed Girl Scout cookies oven!

Set up an impromptu workstation virtually anywhere in a matter of seconds using the slate laptop desk. The ergonomic design of this miniature desk is small enough to carry around yet provides enough room to comfortably work on your laptop.

Keep the campsite free of pesky bugs by lighting it up using the insect repellent lantern. The lantern provides up to 50 hours of light and boasts a rugged and water resistant frame designed to stand up to all types of adverse conditions.

Make the most of your day at the lake with your inner circle while on the six person inflatable lounger. Apart from providing spacious seating, it offers you and your closest friends with leg rests and cup holders for maximum comfort.

Combat boredom when your internet goes down by protecting your PC using the LEGO brick laptop case. While it shields your computer against minor bumps and scratches, the surface allows you to construct whatever your mind desires using LEGO bricks.

<del>Spy on every member of your family</del> Help ensure your family’s safety by outfitting your home with the hidden camera smoke detector. Each detector comes outfitted with a small camera so you can see if a room is safe or not in the event of an emergency.

No matter how hectic the day, there’s always time to enjoy a piping hot roast when you carry the automobile espresso machine. This portable device is easy to maintain and fits comfortably in the center console so you can make a gourmet drink while on the go.

Make the most out of dropping the Brown’s off at the Superbowl by creating beautiful music with the potty piano. It’s designed to fit around the toilet and comes with a songbook so you can play like a seasoned concert pianist during your “opening performance”.

Energize your body for the day ahead by chugging this sugar enriched Duff Beer energy drink. It’s styled after Springfield’s famous brew and comes chock full of delicious and revitalizing ingredients designed to keep you going – oh yeeaaaah!

Jot down important information at a moment’s notice while sporting the wearable dry erase board wristband. This virginity protecting accessory wears like a watch and provides you with a small space to write down important details while you’re on the go.

Help lower the monthly electric bill by monitoring your home’s energy usage with the remote energy management kit. Using your smartphone or tablet, you’ll be able conveniently check and analyze your home’s energy consumption.

Keep a multitude of useful tools at your immediate disposal by carrying the pocket rescue tool. Its compact form is small enough to fit in your hand yet contains over seven extremely useful tools – such as wire strippers, a screwdriver, and a bottle opener.

End the perfect sushi dinner with the ideal dessert by serving up some candy sushi. This colorful and tasty treat places a creative spin on the traditional seafood dish by replacing all the components with sugar, sugar, and more sugar.

Ensure you remain undisturbed while sipping your piping hot cup of Joe by warding people off using the giant STFU coffee mug. The fun novelty quip emblazoned on the front warns others to keep their traps shut while you savor your warm roast.

Turn virtually any outdoor environment into the ideal spot for a delightful alfresco lunch with the rolling picnic table cooler. This versatile cooler comes jam packed with everything you need to have a picnic, including two small tables and their accompanying seats.

Make your dreams of rock superstardom a reality as you learn to wail on your axe like a god using this wireless guitar learning tool. No matter what experience level you’re currently at, this smart guitar makes learning the various chords fun and easy.

Play your favorite games no matter where you are by always making sure you have the portable gaming unit at your side. Wherever you go, you’ll be able to eradicate boredom in one fell swoop as you enjoy your favorite titles on the 19 inch LED display.

Create face-melting beats that’ll drive every party goer crazy using this analog rhythm machine. This 16-step sequencer comes with 8 memory patches and allows for instant editing via the intuitive user interface – so you can mix, cut and slice loops on the go.

Relive the glory of the early ’90s all over again by introducing the addicting game of pogs and slammers to a whole new generation. This nostalgic kit comes with 100 brand newpogs featuring phat 90s artwork in addition to 2 metal slammers.

Keep an eye on your precious bundle of joy at all times using this wireless video baby monitor. This high tech monitor comes with two-way audio as well as a 2.8″ color LCD monitor and infrared night vision to ensure Jr. remains safe and sound.

Turn any questionable water source into a contaminant-free thirst quencher by drinking out of the water filtration bottle. Field-proven for over ten years, this unique bottle features filtration technology that removes up to 99.9999% of contaminants.

titleEN: Darth Vader Color Changing Table Lamp
content: Give the dark side of your room a little more light by turning on the Darth Vader color changing table lamp. This unique lamp can shine in one of seven vibrant colors and is made using an engrave machining process that creates stunning optical illusions.

titleEN: App Controlled Flying And Rolling Drone
content: Take your love of droning to uncharted territory by getting behind the controls of the app controlled flying and rolling drone. This compact drone can traverse both land and air with amazing stability and speed ideal for performing neat acrobatic tricks.

Fondle your furniture every time you need a little ambient lighting by flicking on the penis switch lamp. No matter what time of day it is, this cheeky fellow is always up for having his little switch flicked up and down and up and down – and oh god – up and down.

Ensure fellow party goers end up rip roaring drunk at your next water themed soirée with help from the inflatable beer pong table. This five foot long table inflates in a flash and features specialized recesses designed to keep your drinks upright during gameplay.

Pull down the see through sun visor and keep the sun out of your eyes and face while avoiding possible blind spots. This handy device installs in seconds without tools and provides some much needed relief from the sun’s unrelenting rays.

Show everyone how awesome you are at carpe’ing your diem with this fashionable carpe diem shirt. Made from a tri-blend material that’s extremely soft and comfortable, it’s the must-have fashion accessory for anyone who enjoys making the most of their days.

Light up the streets with your great fashion sense by wearing a pair of LED sneakers. These eye-catching kicks sport a wrap-around LED band that can be customized with one of seven colors so you can match them with any outfit.

Poke fun at your aging relative’s advanced age with class and humor by using the “You’re Old” birthday candles. The creative design is ideal for use when there’s not enough room on the cake or when the birthday boy/girl is sensitive about their age.

Working straight out of your car has never been easier thanks to the portable car desk. It fits perfectly in the passenger seat, comes with a handy writing surface and features a multitude of compartments ideal for distracting you while behind the wheel.

Keep track of your daily alcohol intake with scientific accuracy by sipping your vino out of these laboratory beaker wine glasses. It’s the ideal instrument for all wine aficionados to use for self medicating after a stressful day making scientific discoveries.

Refine your crime fighting skills in true Bruce Wayne fashion by arming yourself with these Batman throwing stars. They’re small enough to fit discreetly in your utility belt and are perfect for impaling everything from wooden surfaces to super villains.

Enjoy your favorite tunes on the go by equipping your bicycle with this practical bike mounted Bluetooth speaker. It’s water resistant so you can ride in any weather and comes with enough juice to run up to 10 hours, making it ideal for the two-wheeled audiophile.

Indulge your green thumb as you give your home some aesthetic appeal by planting these cherry blossom bonsai seeds. They’re ideal for your at home zen garden, helping you relax as you meticulously sculpt and prune your miniature tree.

Sweetening your beverage has never been more macabre than with the sugar skull spoon. Made from food-grade stainless steel this custom utensil comes molded in the shape of a spooky skull and is dishwasher safe so you can use it everyday.
